conversations.content: Vacation, wooooo!
Vice Captain of the White Sparrows Patia
This day is the reward for all the months I spent toiling away at my duties.
I have a brand-new set of swimwear, and a perfect beach lying in front of me.
Here I go! It's a full-tilt sprint straight into the beautiful blue ocean!
OKAY, WHAT THE HELL?!
Gyaargh!
Eeeek! Save me, my apple dumpling! There are nasty fiends strewn across this entire beach!
This is truly a sad day for beachgoing, my berry buckle. Let's go back to town at once and find a less risky vacation.
Grargh! Raaaargh!
Berry Buckle is right—this beach is crammed to the gills with fiends!
I know not what is causing this, but as a knight, I cannot stand by and do nothing. Time to deal with this problem.
Haaaah!
Gyaaargh...
Seems they're not much threat one-on-one. I'll take them all out and restore peace to the beach!
And then, it's back to vacation! Let's do this!
Gyargh! Blargh!
WHYYYYYYY?!
Will this never end?! What in the name of snow cones is going ON with this beach?!
If this keeps up, I'll spend my entire vacation slaying fiends!
No! I refuse to allow such a tragedy!
I WILL solve this! For the sake of peace on the beach, and my vacation!
I need to figure out where all these fiends are coming from and cut the problem off at the heart.
What the—?!
Hmm. A letter, is it?
Blast, this is no mere letter... Someone has challenged me!
Gar, Ye Fool Knight,  How DARE ye lay a finger on me underlings! As their cap'n, I'm challengin' ya to a true duel of the seas, so I am!
The form'a yer humiliation will be a beach volleyball match fair and true. Now see that yer yellow-bellied self is on the beach tomorrow!  —Sincerely, Barbary
Who is this Barbary person, and why is she challenging me to beach volleyball?
Also, why did she write the letter with an accent? That's just unnecessary.
Permit US to answer your query!
Beach Regulator / Preacher Estelle
Beach Security / Paladyn Julietta
Hot-Blooded Summer Instructor Celliera
You're all from the Halidom!
Barbary is the name of a fiend who was once a pirate in this area.
After everyone helped put her in her place and I gave her a stern talking-to, she swore to give up piracy and violence.
As she is deathly afraid of having to sit through another of my lectures, she's been keeping to her word thus far.
But it looks like she found a loophole: If she challenges foes to beach volleyball, she can use nonviolent means to take down her enemies with impunity.
Take her enemies down... with volleyball?
Do not take her challenge lightly! Barbary has six arms and legs, so her ball-handling capabilities are on a whole other level.
She used this strategy to eliminate her competition and take over the beach.
After she took down the reigning volleyball champ, all the other locals refused to go near her.
They've been searching the land trying to find players who can hold their own against her, but all to no avail—until the three of us showed up, that is.
...Why do we actually have to play her, though?
When one has been challenged by the ball, one must WIN by the ball!
Oh. Right.
As we already sent Barbary packing once, the locals thought we could do it again. In fact, we were in the process of searching for one final teammate.
What do you say, Patia? Will you join our cause?
And you're SURE this has to be volleyball. We can't just...you know? Crush our enemies and drive them before us?
Such a strategy ill befits a knight!
Well, I suppose it WOULD be bad form to stick a lance in someone during a volleyball match...
I'm starting to feel you have a point. We must win by the ball.
Then are you saying...?
I am. Let's do this!
As a White Sparrow, I shall not be outdone by my enemies—whether by sword, lance, spike-covered doom axe, or volleyball!
We will defeat them and return peace to the beach—and THEN I will finally be able to take my damned vacation!
Huzzah!
The next morning, at the net...
Huzzno...
Gahar har har! And here I thought I'd be facin' a wily foe, seein' as how ye sent all me underlings packin' in tears...
But yer just a buncha beach bums what can't hold a candle to ol' Barbary! Gahaaaar har har har yar!
We've gravely miscalculated Barbary's power.
How can I ever face Elisanne again with such an ignominious defeat hanging over me like a pall?
We need a new strategy. Best to withdraw for now and live to serve another day.
Yar, ye blasted cod-livers can face me as many times as ye like—it won't do ye a bit'a good, so it won't!
Now, if ye've learned yer lesson, get off me beach.
There ain't man nor beast what can lay me to ground in beach volleyball, which means this beach is pirate land! Gahaaaar har har! Yar har ho!
Fine. We withdraw for now. But this is NOT over.
We'll win next time, Barbary! You WILL get what's owed you!

Patia and her fellow Halidom pals took on the beach-hogging boss of fiends, Barbary, in a spirited game of beach volleyball. Alas, they suffered a crushing defeat under the villain's brutal six-limbed assault.
Afterward, our heroes held a team huddle to debrief and discuss strategies for how best to spike the pirate off their beloved beach.
We just need to work on our prideful attitudes and lack of skill.
Yes, it appears that beach volleyball is far deeper than we first thought. This game demands pure strength.
And yet Barbary's impenetrable defense combined with the constant barrage of spikes from her six limbs is staggering.
So we simply need to get STRONGER! We'll train and train until our power is surpassed by no one and nothing!
I don't think we can brute force our way into victory; technique and teamwork will be necessary as well.
It's an overwhelming task, and I'm at a bit of a loss as to where to begin.
Good thing I know someone who can help!
If I recall, she's in a nearby town...
...So you were hoping I might divine how you could achieve victory over Barbary?
Fortune Teller & Reader of Fates Verica
Anything you can tell us would be most helpful.
Thank you for coming to Lewis Island, Verica. We simply must defeat Barbary!
Yes, I sense the strength of your passion. Very well. All of you look into my orbuculum and breathe slowly and deeply. Match your breath with mine.
Goodness, this is...
I see a figure unleashing a mighty spike. Such intensity! One might even go so far as to call it...the Omega Shot!
Then mastering this Omega Shot must be the key to defeating Barbary!
It should be, yes—though I've little idea how to actually attempt such a process.
Just knowing where to direct our efforts is an important first step.
There's no more time for dawdle, ladies. We begin the training at once!
And where, exactly, are we to train, considering the beach is overrun?
I may have some thoughts on that subject. I heard tale from a customer of a location deep within this island that would make for excellent training grounds.
They call it...Chutzpah Cliff.
Lewis Island Chutzpah Cliff
Now then, my chickadees! Are you ready? Prayers said and mothers kissed goodbye?
The road to learn the Omega Shot will be one of pain! Of anguish! Of horror! And only those strong enough to pass will have the honor to call me master for true!
Yes, master!
Verica?! What are you doing here?!
I want to help you realize the future you seek. Now stop gawking at me and answer your master, Patia!
Oh, er, right. Yes, master!
Then we begin! As you are all rather soft, let us start with the basics.
Take a ball and bounce it off your forearms one thousand times without letting it hit the ground. Ready...and BEGIN!
Yes, master!
No rest! No lollygagging! WHAT DO WE SAY ABOUT THE BALL?!
THE BALL IS OUR FRIEND!
Exactly! Now keep that up, ten thousand times!
Wait, ten THOUSAND?!
Didn't you just say 1,000 times?!
There's no crying in beach volleyball! If I ask you do to this a million times, I expect you to do it with a SMILE!
Y-yes, master!
*pant* We...did it... Ten thousand... Think I'm...going to die...
Well done, all of you. Well, except for the quitter.
Wait, who quit?!
Fate is cruel... I wanted to see it through to the end but... F-forigive me...
Verica!
Her soul has been entrusted to all of you. Bear her burden as we advance onto the next training session...
A free climb of the cliff! NOW GET SOME!
Wait, hold on. We're climbing a cliff  without tools or ropes? Just our hands?!
Master, what in the world does rock climbing have to do with volleyball?
Rock climbing is applicable to ALL sport— it's a foundational concept among all knight's armsmasters. THAT'S what it has to do with this, my little chickadee.
And we'll grow even stronger if we attempt it with our bare hands?
What? No, not at all. Free climbing is just a hobby of mine.
A...hobby?
Listen up, whelps! If you want the Omega Shot, quit your bellyaching and follow along with me!
Y-yes, master!
*wheeze* Not to question your divine wisdom, Goddess Ilia...but why did you even see fit to MAKE this cliff...?
Now THAT was a climb! Might even be on par with the Wall of Despair at the White Sparrows' training site.
Ah, I've heard plenty of tales about that little man-made beauty!
Wait, so is cliff climbing the secret of the White Sparrows' skill?
I do not know...but as I am not a knight... I cannot go on...
Tapping out? Very well. I will be sure there are always pretty flowers on your grave. ...The rest of you, with me!
Leave it to me, Estelle! I'll take care of the rest of the plan from here on out!
D-do it... You must acquire... the Omega Shot...
Verica and Estelle's souls go with me. What is my next mission, master?!
Bears.
GRAAAAARRR!
All right, why are there bears here, and why are you SO CALM ABOUT IT?!
Prior to this, I took on a request from the locals to deal with some rampaging local wildlife and lured them here.
Now, let's teach these toughies a lesson. We'll earn peace for the locals and strengthen ourselves at the same time!
We don't do THIS bare-handed, right?
Of course you do—it's bare-handed bear-handling! Observe.
Rrrrrgh...
This round of training is done when three bears have been taken down. Now then, my chickadees: bust up some bears!
I am a Paladyn, and it is my duty to fulfill the expectations placed upon me. Be brave, Julietta!
GRAAAAAR!
Nope! Forget it. My stomach can't take this.
Don't be too hard on yourself, Julietta! This very likely isn't a skill you'll ever need in your life as a Paladyn!
Nor you as a White Sparrow, yet here we stand. And if you do not accomplish this, you will never be able to defeat Barbary.
You are the last woman standing, so your actions here speak for all.
I will do this thing! I swear upon the souls entrusted to me by my fellow volleyballers!
Now imagine you have ball in hand and attack the bears as you would a spike.
Concentrate the power you need to break through Barbary's defenses and show me your might!
YES, MASTER! HAAAAAH!
Ragh! Grgh! Hur!
All bears down, master!
She did it... But what in the world was that light just now?
That's what I saw in my crystal ball! The Omega Shot!
Truly?!
There's no mistaking it: Our instructor's strict coaching has awakened the power within Patia.
And this will let us defeat Barbary?
You are a little chickadee no more, but a mighty soaring eagle.
From this day forth, you are the ace of our beach volleyball team—AND captain! Do I hear any complaints?
No! We're counting on you, Captain!
And I accept this duty with gratitude. As ace and captain, I swear to you that my play will bring you pride!
Now get ready, everyone... We have a pirate to pummel!
Yes!
Comin' all the way here just to lose again? Ye landlubbers never learn!
We'll see how much you're barking once you lay eyes on our secret weapon.
Oh, aye? Go on with ye, then.
OMEGAAAAAA SHOOOOOOT!
Gar, THAT be yer secret weapon? Don't make me be laughin'!
She...she repelled it!
I've seen worse from sea cucumbers. Yer Omega Shot is an Omega FLOP!
Now THIS, me trig lassies... THIS is a shot.
No way, it... GYAAAAH!
Huh? Oh, what a terrible nightmare!
Thank goodness it was just a dream!
Unfortunately, it was no dream.
Wait, you can't mean...
Barbary's shot knocked you unconscious. You're only now waking up.
I imagine it was the harsh training along with the regret of losing that did you in. I'm sorry we weren't more help.
I don't believe it...
Reality is reality. We lost. The Omega Shot did nothing.
In that case, let us take a break and try to come up with a new strategy.
Y-yes, of course... And apologies for making you all fuss over me.
Well, this is pathetic. Some captain I am!
Responsibility for a loss falls upon the shoulders of the captain alone.
Patia, don't say that. We lost as a team.
Pretty words that I appreciate, but I still cannot forgive myself.
I...I need to be alone for a while.
No! She's still recovering! I'm going after her!
Leave her, Estelle.
Patia is strong. She will be back.
I hope so...
Ugh.
I walked all day and ended up here. Guess the fiends don't come out at night.
*sigh*... I lost.
Everyone believed in me. I was the captain and the ace.
Damn it all, I haven't been this frustrated since I first enlisted with the Sparrows! What was it that Captain Leif said to me all those years ago...?
Patia, betraying trust and failing to live up to expectations are not synonymous.
Fortunately, you have next time. So once you have finished your due self-reflection, go see your fellows who are worried about you.
He's right. I need to pull it together.
But the future we saw in the crystal ball said we could win with the Omega Shot. If that prediction was wrong, do we even get another chance?
If I were to recklessly take Barbary on and lose yet again...
If you continue to face your destiny, it can always be changed.
May I sit next to you, Patia?
How long have you been there, Verica?
A while now. It seems to me that you are still troubled.
My Omega Shot didn't faze Barbary. I have no right to call myself a captain.
All of you would have been better off without me.
You may not be able to change the past, Patia, but you can change the future. We all must look ahead to next time and keep doing whatever we can.
But even if we do take her on again, we have no idea if we'll actually WIN. And if I were to make us lose again...
Enough of that talk. We are a team. We win as one and lose that way also.
We will find a path to victory together.
But with the Omega Shot defeated...
Obtaining the Omega Shot DID make us stronger.
The idea of learning powerful shots itself may still have been a good one. In which case...
Of course. We need EVERYONE'S strength!
Come on, Verica! We have to find the others and have a strategy meeting!
I'll repay you for this someday, Verica! I swear I will!
Think nothing of it. If I was able to help someone open a path to the future, that is what matters most.
Aaaaand I'm back!
Patia! Are you better now?
Yes, thanks to all of you. My apologies for worrying everyone.
You certainly seem to be in higher spirits.
Have you seen the light in some fashion?
Thanks to Verica, I'm no longer worried about whether or not I'm suited to being the captain of this team.
So we're going to try again!
But we used the Omega Shot and lost. What will be different next time?
Heh. We're going to have an even BETTER Omega Shot...
The TURBO Omega Shot!
Is such a thing even possible?!
I have absolutely no idea! But this is what we need to do.
We have a long road ahead of us, and I hope to walk it with all of you.
I know I've been a disappointment as both an ace and a captain, but will you beach volleyball alongside me once more?
There's no win without you, Patia.
Then onward to victory!
Wait, you want to go into town?
Yes. You've been here training non-stop, and it's time for a break.
I appreciate the invitation, but right now, I have to master the Turbo Omega Shot.
A body needs rest, Patia. Even yours.
Indeed, muscles won't grow if you don't rest properly after putting them to use.
So perhaps a little change of pace is a good idea after all.
You came to this island for a vacation, didn't you? So what do you say?
Well, I suppose I COULD use a bit of a break...
SO MUCH FUN! Wooo! Now THIS is what vacation is supposed to look like!
Let's head to that general store next! Ooo, and that food cart next to it looks quite interesting as well!
If you can't decide, just do both. We will examine the store first, then pass by the cart.
For my part, I'm VERY curious about that ice cream shop over there. Do you mind?
We set out to recharge ourselves today, so ice cream ahoy!
Heh. I'm glad you seem to be enjoying yourself so much, Patia.
It's because of you. Although I do wonder if it's okay to be having fun like this when Barbary is still out there.
If you're worried about that, you should add in some training before bed.
After that, I'll treat you to my special spirogyra-and-liver smoothie!
I'm sorry, what?
It's an armsmaster specialty made by combining highly nutritious slimes, medicinal herbs, and raw liver. Perfect for building muscle mass!
Is THAT why you were off buying ingredients while we were enjoying our ice cream?!
Interested? I've plenty for everyone!
I prefer not to vomit before bed, thank you. Also, I have other things to do this night.
Do your plans have anything to do with the little souvenir you bought earlier?
H-how did you know about that?!
My eyes are naturally drawn to the details. I hope he enjoys your surprise.
Th-there's no deep meaning to it! I just wanted to...convey my gratitude...
You're worrying quite a bit for something that you claim has so little value.
I just... Look, it's hard to pick something that perfectly expresses feelings, okay?!
If only I could convey all my feelings with one swing of the Loving Hand like my grandmother, I could've gotten through it without worrying so much.
Sorry, I'm confused. What?
My grandmother had the ability to use the Loving Hand to stir a person's very soul. It's a skill I'm still trying to perfect.
Ah, I understand perfectly. I've had to work to get better at expressing myself as well.
I may have inherited great strength from my ancestors, but when it comes to Elisanne, I find myself overly passionate without even realizing it.
I can see by the way your muscles tense that you two are kindred spirits.
You could tell that much just by watching their muscles?!
Yes, it's a specialty of mine. Did I not mention it?
No, you did not. It seems there is still much we do not know about each other.
That's because being so focused on defeating Barbary has us doing nothing but training all this time.
Huh. This day off may have been more helpful than I imagined.
Our bonds are growing so much, I don't think ANY opponent can defeat us!
Haw! Looks like we got us some ladies who think they're hot stuff. Right, brah?
Who are you?!
We're the toughest toughs around— the Volleybrahs!
You lot are the outsiders foamin' at the mouth to take down Barbary, yeah?
News flash, ladies—me and my brah are gonna be the ones to take out Barbary, so make like a beach and pound sand!
Hey! What's the big idea throwing that ball around in the middle of town?!
Not runnin', eh? Looks like we'll have to settle this the old-fashioned way...
Unless yer CHICKEN! Baaaawk bawk bawk!
Patia, I think we're being challenged to street volleyball!
I'd only heard of it in rumors! What will we do, Patia?
Fine! We accept!
Bwaaa ha ha! Plucky bunch, ain't ya?! Right then, usual rules: First to three wins, or ya lose if ya get knocked unconscious.
First serve goes to us! Get ready to run home cryin' to mama when I show ya...the Net Melter!
He's got his own ultimate shot! But it'll take more than that... Celliera, to the rear!
Leave it to me!
Brah. BRAH. They blocked your shot, brah!
It'll take more than that for you idiots to defeat OUR training!
Grrr... Fine then! Let's see how ya like my Mad Pecs Slurveball!
There's no curve Julietta can't handle!
I'm already on it—left corner!
Braaaah! We're down by TWO, brah! None'a the local teams even scored a single point on us before!
You're much too weak, yet you chose to challenge us to a street volleyball game— and now you're going to be served! ...Ooo, but I AM clever.
Maybe you can pick up a few pointers for the next time you want to try and challenge a clearly superior opponent.
Am I imagining things, or is our passing crisper than before?
It's not your imagination. Our break today has deepened our team's mutual understanding of one another.
And now that we know each other's special skills, maybe we can...
Everyone, I want to try something! On the next serve, I need Verica and Celliera on support!
Estelle and Julietta, get in front with me! We're going do a team attack!
Everyone, change to formation D!
The heck are they blabbin' about over there, brah?
In this formation—and these conditions— we can do this. Estelle, focus power in your right leg and hit the ball to Julietta!
Think of the Loving Hand, and put all of your feelings into the strike!
I get it now... Here you go, Julietta! Take all of my desire for victory!
Julietta, tighten your muscles and release your power! Give it everything you have!
My power is yours, Patia!
I can feel your thoughts AND your strength...
Behold the power of our bonds!
TURBOOOO OMEGAAAA SHOOOOT!
BRAAAAAAAAAAAH!
*pant* *pant* We...we did it... We learned the ultimate shot!
Huzzah for Patia!
Now we can teach Barbary a lesson once and for all!
Thank you—ALL of you. I never could have done this without you.
Are you ready for one final push?
Of course. We're a team.
But we're counting on you to lead the way, Captain.
This time, we WILL taste victory!
YEAAAH!
At long last, this moment has arrived. It's time for us to settle the score.
We all know the rules: Deathmatch style, first to three wins. Agreed?
Gar, make all the rules ye want—I'll still be the pirate queen of volleyball!
Your confidence was appropriate once, but not anymore.
Yer all talk, scallywag. But as champ, I'll show ye mercy and grant first serve.
Too kind. Are you ready, everyone?
Born ready.
Then let's show Barbary the power of our united force!
With this terrain... Everyone, let's go with formation A!
Understood! We'll make her regret this!
Weak! Have yerself a taste'a this, lass!
Not quite! Celliera, you're up!
Julietta, it's to you—trust your muscles and unleash your power!
I'll not hold anything back. Hah!
Gar, the ball pushed me foot aside and ran aground!
We did it! Point for us!
'Tis a fluke and no more! There will be no next time for ye lassies! Har!
S-such a sharp serve... There's no way we can possibly counter it!
Gahar har har! Ye'll be bones in the briny deep before the day comes when ye can defeat me!
There's no ball we can't receive with the power of our teamwork. ...Estelle!
We'll show her the power of Formation A! Haaah!
Excellent bump! Now goooooo!
Gar, I be keelhauled!
We did it! It's definitely working! And we're in the lead—huh?!
I sense an ill presence forming.
Ye DARE make a fool out of me...
I'M the boss of this here beach, see? And I'll never be acceptin' a loss to a pack'a lily-livered parrot guano!
The time for pretty words be over. The time for action be now!
Come, me minions! Give 'em a taste of me delicious bombs!
GYAAAARGH!
Okay, this CLEARLY falls outside the scope of beach volleyball!
What do we do, Patia? We can't take on exploding enemies unarmed!
We fight and we win—within the rules, beach volleyball style!
Even if our opponent is violating the rules, we mustn't sink to their level or our victory will count for nothing.
It's only meaningful when you win a crushing victory with a straightforward, honest approach—which is why I'm going to need all of your help!
It's time for the Turbo Omega Shot!
Then let us pulverize Barbary and her minions in one fell blow!
I'll fill the ball up with all of the feelings I have!
Though I cannot offer much, please take my energy!
I entrust my power to you.
My soul is on fire, and it burns for YOU!
I'm receiving everyone's power!
We have something for you, Barbary, and it's from ALL of us!
TURBOOOO OMEGAAAA SHOOOOT!
Gaaaaaaaarrrr...
Gar, ye be cheatin'! There be a bomb in that there volleyball, says I!
No cheating—just shared bonds that will never yield in the face of your despicable deeds!
You lost fair and square, which means the beach is ours. ...Agreed?
Yar, I'll be goin'...
Hold! Who said you could leave?
I gave you such a sermon back then, I thought you had truly mended your ways.
But it looks like my words landed on deaf ears, so this time I'm going to shape you up for good and all!
Even if you don't use violence, tyrannical behavior of ANY kind is strictly forbidden. If you understand, say, ＂yes, ma'am＂!
And if you DON'T understand, I'll use an even more passionate version of the Loving Hand than I did last time...
Y-yar, ma'am! Of course, ma'am!
You too, minions! Let me hear it!
Yaaaar! Graaaaar!
Having been soundly defeated in the noble sport of beach volleyball, Barbary reforms and peace is returned to the beach once more.  And with that...
WOOOOO! VACATION AT LAAAAST!
Come now, Patia. You must maintain SOME level of decorum.
The hell I do! I'm on vacation, the fiends are gone, and it's nothing but blue as far as the eye can see.
That means it's FINALLY time to bask in my swimsuit and enjoy the relaxing beach!
...Hmm? What was that sound?
Er, no. Must be nothing. Let's just ignore it and get back to...
Barbary may have been defeated, but I'm no two-bit pirate! THIS BEACH IS MIIIIINE!
Okay, NOW what?!
*sniff* No... Not this... Anything but this... 'C-cause my duty as a knight means...
Dry your tears, dear Patia, and ready your axe.
I don't understand why this keeps happening...
GIVE ME MY VACATIOOOOOON!
